scripts.sass: test -n "$THEME" && node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/bulmaswatch/$THEME --include-path node_modules/bulma/sass --output css bulma.scss && node-sass --watch --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/bulmaswatch/$THEME --include-path node_modules/bulma/sass --output css bulma.scss || echo Set THEME env var.
